ygData.subject: Re: Conflict at the Ark
ygData.msgSnippet: Maxima s optics glowed. I don t give a damn who your bosses are or what they think! I am here, & to have any one here at the Ark is far too dangerous! NO

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Maxima's optics glowed. "I don't give a damn who your 'bosses' are or what 
they think! I am here, & to have any one here at the Ark is far too dangerous! 
NO ONE here at the Ark! & I'll be damned if I let anyone else get near here!" 
She was becoming rather frustrated with the fact that there were too many here 
already. 1 was more than enough. It was her intention that she only show up 
here on a rare basis to check things. Never to stay here nor let any one else 
here. If it continued this way-

"If my own orders & directives & plans are underminded & over riden, then I 
will take drastic measures myself!" Her anger was more than apparent in her 
voice. She meant business, & if the others didn't like it being here at the Ark, 
then she was mad enough to change a few things. 

--part1_1d4.af9bdec.2c0ed244_boundary
